list.name: Default
list.comment: Angular component for messaging has been created, the messages also appear

task.summary: project now set up with mySQL

big commit today, this mostly involves the introduction of users to the system. There is now a login/sign up page where only signed up users may enter. However the auction still remains a separate application as it means the code is more modular and if at a later date authentication changes all will be well.
some clean up, ensuring todays is tidy and using the correct bootstrap, i keep forgetting i have it local to the project!
